syntax:
{
"type": "software_architecture",
"title": "Healthcare System Architecture",
"nodes": [
{"id": "ui", "label": "Frontend UI", "type": "frontend", "description": "Handles user interactions and displays data.", "technology": "React"},
{"id": "auth", "label": "Authentication", "type": "security", "description": "Manages user authentication and authorization.", "technology": "OAuth2"},
{"id": "apigateway", "label": "API Gateway", "type": "infrastructure", "description": "Ingress point and request routing.", "technology": "Envoy"},
{"id": "patientservice", "label": "Patient Service", "type": "backend", "description": "Manages patient-related data and business logic.", "technology": "Java"},
{"id": "appointmentservice", "label": "Appointment Service", "type": "backend", "description": "Manages appointment scheduling.", "technology": "Java"},
{"id": "billingservice", "label": "Billing Service", "type": "backend", "description": "Manages billing and payments.", "technology": "Java"},
{"id": "prescriptionsservice", "label": "Prescriptions Service", "type": "backend", "description": "Manages prescriptions and medication.", "technology": "Java"},
{"id": "doctorservice", "label": "Doctor Service", "type": "backend", "description": "Manages doctor-related data and business logic.", "technology": "Java"},
{"id": "patientdb", "label": "Patient DB", "type": "database", "description": "Stores patient information.", "technology": "PostgreSQL"},
{"id": "appointmentdb", "label": "Appointment DB", "type": "database", "description": "Stores appointment data.", "technology": "Cassandra"},
{"id": "billingdb", "label": "Billing DB", "type": "database", "description": "Stores billing information.", "technology": "MongoDB"},
{"id": "prescriptionsdb", "label": "Prescriptions DB", "type": "database", "description": "Stores prescription data.", "technology": "MySQL"},
{"id": "doctordb", "label": "Doctor DB", "type": "database", "description": "Stores doctor information.", "technology": "PostgreSQL"},
{"id": "messagequeue", "label": "Message Queue", "type": "infrastructure", "description": "Message passing between services.", "technology": "Kafka"},
{"id": "cache", "label": "Cache", "type": "infrastructure", "description": "Data caching for performance.", "technology": "Redis"}
],
"connections": [
{"from": "ui", "to": "apigateway", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "HTTP"},
{"from": "auth", "to": "apigateway", "label": "Authentication", "type": "auth", "protocol": "OAuth2"},
{"from": "apigateway", "to": "patientservice", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "gRPC"},
{"from": "apigateway", "to": "appointmentservice", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "gRPC"},
{"from": "apigateway", "to": "billingservice", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "gRPC"},
{"from": "apigateway", "to": "prescriptionsservice", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "gRPC"},
{"from": "apigateway", "to": "doctorservice", "label": "API Calls", "type": "api", "protocol": "gRPC"},
{"from": "patientservice", "to": "patientdb", "label": "Database Queries", "type": "db", "protocol": "SQL"},
{"from": "appointmentservice", "to": "appointmentdb", "label": "Database Queries", "type": "db", "protocol": "NoSQL"},
{"from": "billingservice", "to": "billingdb", "label": "Database Queries", "type": "db", "protocol": "NoSQL"},
{"from": "prescriptionsservice", "to": "prescriptionsdb", "label": "Database Queries", "type": "db", "protocol": "SQL"},
{"from": "doctorservice", "to": "doctordb", "label": "Database Queries", "type": "db", "protocol": "SQL"},
{"from": "patientservice", "to": "messagequeue", "label": "Event Flows", "type": "event", "protocol": "Kafka"},
{"from": "appointmentservice", "to": "messagequeue", "label": "Event Flows", "type": "event", "protocol": "Kafka"},
{"from": "billingservice", "to": "messagequeue", "label": "Event Flows", "type": "event", "protocol": "Kafka"},
{"from": "prescriptionsservice", "to": "messagequeue", "label": "Event Flows", "type": "event", "protocol": "Kafka"},
{"from": "doctorservice", "to": "messagequeue", "label": "Event Flows", "type": "event", "protocol": "Kafka"},
{"from": "cache", "to": "patientservice", "label": "Data Transformations", "type": "transform", "protocol": "N/A"},
{"from": "cache", "to": "appointmentservice", "label": "Data Transformations", "type": "transform", "protocol": "N/A"},
{"from": "cache", "to": "billingservice", "label": "Data Transformations", "type": "transform", "protocol": "N/A"},
{"from": "cache", "to": "prescriptionsservice", "label": "Data Transformations", "type": "transform", "protocol": "N/A"},
{"from": "cache", "to": "doctorservice", "label": "Data Transformations", "type": "transform", "protocol": "N/A"}
],
"clusters": [
{"id": "frontend", "label": "Frontend Layer", "nodes": ["ui"]},
{"id": "security", "label": "Security Layer", "nodes": ["auth"]},
{"id": "apigateway", "label": "API Gateway", "nodes": ["apigateway"]},
{"id": "backend", "label": "Backend Layer", "nodes": ["patientservice", "appointmentservice", "billingservice", "prescriptionsservice", "doctorservice"]},
{"id": "data", "label": "Data Layer", "nodes": ["patientdb", "appointmentdb", "billingdb", "prescriptionsdb", "doctordb"]},
{"id": "infrastructure", "label": "Infrastructure Layer", "nodes": ["messagequeue", "cache"]}
],
"styles": {
"ui": {"color": "#3f51b5", "shape": "circle", "border": "dotted"},
"auth": {"color": "#f44336", "shape": "diamond", "border": "double"},
"apigateway": {"color": "#4caf50", "shape": "hexagon", "border": "solid"},
"patientservice": {"color": "#e91e63", "shape": "rectangle", "border": "solid"},
"appointmentservice": {"color": "#9c27b0", "shape": "ellipse", "border": "solid"},
"billingservice": {"color": "#00bcd4", "shape": "triangle", "border": "solid"},
"prescriptionsservice": {"color": "#009688", "shape": "parallelogram", "border": "solid"},
"doctorservice": {"color": "#3f51b5", "shape": "trapezoid", "border": "solid"},
"patientdb": {"color": "#9e9e9e", "shape": "cylinder", "border": "dashed"},
"appointmentdb": {"color": "#607d8b", "shape": "cube", "border": "dashed"},
"billingdb": {"color": "#795548", "shape": "frame", "border": "dashed"},
"prescriptionsdb": {"color": "#6d6e71", "shape": "octagon", "border": "dashed"},
"doctordb": {"color": "#d32f2f", "shape": "star", "border": "dashed"},
"messagequeue": {"color": "#2196f3", "shape": "cloud", "border": "dotted"},
"cache": {"color": "#4caf50", "shape": "folder", "border": "dotted"}
}
}
description: This diagram represents a healthcare system architecture, featuring a frontend UI, authentication, API gateway, various backend services (patient, appointment, billing, prescriptions, doctor), databases for each service, a message queue for event flows, and a cache for data transformations, all interconnected through APIs, database queries, event flows, and data transformations.
